title: Crunchy potato wedges
ingredients: ['2 or 3 large baking potatoes, sliced into wedges', '2 or 3 tablespoons olive oil', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', 'Generous amount of paprika, about 1 or 2 tablespoons', '1 wholemeal bread crust, crumbled into crumbs', 'Handful of fresh parsley, chopped']
